intro: Fimbristylis ovalis, commonly known as the oval spikerush, is a species of flowering plant in the family Cyperaceae. It is a perennial herb that typically grows in wetlands, marshes, and other moist environments. The plant has narrow, grass-like leaves and produces small, clustered flower heads. Its inflorescence consists of a spicate structure with numerous tiny flowers. Fimbristylis ovalis plays an important role in wetland ecosystems by providing habitat and food for various wildlife species.
